content: In #81789 CI reports a failure but I don't know how to repro locally. If I run the same command my build fails with dozens of different errors. Any tips?
It looks like you figured it out, ci is passing now :)
Yeah I fixed the problem, but not by running the failing test locally.. I just noticed in the error message that I have a typo..

Were the errors in rustc_hir and related to const-generics? I had that happen running ./x.py doc and couldn't figure how to fix it: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/182449-t-compiler.2Fhelp/topic/x.2Epy.20doc.20errors
